name.ja: <ruby>混<rt>こん</rt></ruby><ruby>沌<rt>とん</rt></ruby>の<ruby>蘇<rt>そ</rt></ruby><ruby>生<rt>せい</rt></ruby><ruby>者<rt>しゃ</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: Shuffle 2 Level 4 monsters with 500 ATK/1000 DEF from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: This card gains 1000 ATK until the end of your opponent's next turn. Then, you can Special Summon 1 Level 8 non-Effect Warrior Type Ritual Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.
